oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Representations of Leavitt Path Algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koç, Ayten
Özaydın, Murad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Rings and Algebras
16G20, 16G60
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the (unital) representations of a Leavitt path algebra $L(\Gamma)$ of a finitely separated di(rected )graph $\Gamma$ over a field. We show that the category of $L(\Gamma)$-modules is equivalent to a subcategory of quiver representations. We give a necessary and sufficient criterion for the existence of a nonzero finite dimensional representation. When $\Gamma$ is a (non-separated) row-finite digraph we determine all possible finite dimensional quotients of $L(\Gamma)$.
